com.appsrox.instachat

Class PhotoCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.appsrox.instachat.PhotoCache

  • public class PhotoCache
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps contact photos cached in memory. Can also cache to disk (not in use because contact images changed during sync)
